intervention_catalogue.name: Finance, benefit and debt services
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Finance, benefit and debt services help men on probation manage their money effectively, reducing financial stress that could lead to reoffending.
long_description: Finance, benefit and debt services help men on probation manage their money effectively, reducing financial stress that could lead to reoffending.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.

possible_outcomes: Finance, benefit and debt services aim to achieve one or more of the following outcomes:
• improving financial skills, including online banking
• understanding what benefits they’re eligible for and how to apply
• setting up support to maintain income, manage money safely and reduce debt
• claiming Universal Credit quickly, including getting all the documentation needed to claim ready before leaving prison
• getting help with banking or debt management while in custody
